DRR.title: Disaster risk reduction: countries where there is an adaptation plan and/or robust disaster risk reduction measures

FORECAST.title: Weather information: countries where there are weather forecasts available

COMM.title: Communication: distance to roads and markets (less than 1h)

GOV.title: Government effectiveness: countries where government effectively supports local communities to adapt and/or mitigate climate change

ECTR.title: Basic needs: countries where most of the population has access to electricity

INFO.title: Access to information: countries where communities have access to information through ICTs, phones, or other means

GDP.title: Economic: countries where the community has the economic means (>20 000 USD/year) to adapt to climate change and associated hazards

CREDIT.title: Economic: share of total government expenditure in agriculture, forestry, and fishing
